item.title: Receiving the kingdom of God like a little child
item.description: Dear Amy, What does it mean to receive the kingdom of God like a little child? What a vital question! Jesus himself said, “Truly I tell you, anyone who will not receive the kingdom of God like a little child will never enter it” (Luke 18:17). We must fathom this then! Let’s consider three aspects of a little child’s relationship with their earthly parents, and infer how to receive from our heavenly father.
